result.enMarketingTitle: Fronds Luxury Villas
result.enPropertyOverView:
At The Fronds Luxury Villas, every detail has been meticulously crafted to provide residents with an unparalleled living experience. Here's why The Fronds stands out among the rest:


Prime Location: Situated on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, the largest manmade island in the world, The Fronds Luxury Villas offers an exclusive address surrounded by stunning coastal views and world-class amenities. Indulge in the tranquil beauty of the Arabian Sea, just steps away from your doorstep.


Exquisite Design: Each villa at The Fronds boasts exquisite architectural designs that blend seamlessly with the natural surroundings. Whether it's the iconic Signature Villas with their spacious interiors, private swimming pools, and breathtaking beachfront views, or the Garden Homes with their lush gardens and expansive outdoor spaces, every residence is a testament to elegance and sophistication.


Unrivaled Personalization: With the option of Custom-made Villas, you have the unique opportunity to create your dream home exactly as you envision it. Choose the number of rooms, the layout of living spaces, materials, finishes, and specialized amenities. Your home at The Fronds will be a reflection of your personal taste and style.


World-Class Facilities: The Fronds Luxury Villas offer an array of facilities that elevate your lifestyle. Enjoy direct beach access, private pools, landscaped gardens, and stunning views of the Arabian Gulf. Pamper yourself in the lap of luxury with top-notch amenities that cater to your every need.


Convenient Access: While The Fronds offers a serene retreat from the bustling city, it also provides convenient access to the numerous leisure and entertainment options on Palm Jumeirah. Explore vibrant dining destinations, indulge in retail therapy at high-end boutiques, or engage in water sports activities – all just a stone's throw away.


Experience the pinnacle of luxury living at The Fronds Luxury Villas. Immerse yourself in a world of elegance, comfort, and privacy, where every moment is a celebration of refined living. Don't miss your chance to own a prestigious property on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. Contact us today to secure your slice of paradise.

result.enMarketingTitle: Al Ghadeer
result.enPropertyOverView:
Al Ghadeer in Al Ghadeer Village is a prestigious residential project known for its exceptional amenities, prime location and a wide range of housing options. Al Ghadeer is a highly regarded residential project located within Al Ghadeer Village.


It boasts an array of amenities and facilities elevating the living experience of its residents. The project combines modern architecture with a serene ambiance catering to the needs of families and individuals alike.


 


Location:


Al Ghadeer in Al Ghadeer Village enjoys a strategic location with convenient access to major transportation routes.


Distances in kilometers from important landmarks:


-
 
International Airport - Approximately 35 km.


-
 
Famous Parks - Within a 10 to 15 km radius.


-
 
Major Malls - Within a 15 to 20 km radius.


-
 
City Center - Approximately 25 km.


 


Amenities & Facilities:


Al Ghadeer offers an extensive range of amenities and facilities including:


-
 
Well-equipped fitness center and sports facilities.


-
 
Swimming pools for adults and children.


-
 
Dedicated children's play areas and parks.


-
 
Lush green landscapes and gardens for relaxation.


-
 
Walking and jogging tracks for outdoor activities.


-
 
Retail outlets and supermarkets within the community.


-
 
24/7 security and CCTV surveillance for a safe environment.


-
 
Ample parking spaces for residents and visitors.


 


Types & Sizes of Rooms:


Al Ghadeer offers a diverse range of unit types and sizes to cater to varying preferences and requirements.


Available unit options may include:


-
 
Apartments: 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms (ranging from 60 sqm to 150 sqm).


-
 
Townhouses: 2 and 3 bedrooms (ranging from 150 sqm to 200 sqm).


-
 
Villas: 3, 4 and 5 bedrooms (ranging from 200 sqm to 400 sqm).


 


Why Invest in Al Ghadeer in Al Ghadeer Village?


-
 
Prime location: Al Ghadeer advantageous location offers convenient access to key landmarks and amenities.


-
 
High-quality living: The project provides a well-planned community with exceptional amenities and facilities.


-
 
Growth potential: Al Ghadeer is expected to experience property value appreciation due to ongoing development and increasing demand.


-
 
Rental income opportunities: The project desirable location and amenities makes it attractive for those seeking rental income.

result.enMarketingTitle: Rak Tower
result.enPropertyOverView:
Rak Tower is one of the esteemed residential skyscrapers nestled in the sought-after location of Al Reem Island, Abu Dhabi. Overlooking the pristine Arabian Gulf, this beautiful edifice presents a serene lifestyle amidst the city's bustling environment. The Rak Tower, a brainchild of RAK Properties, stands 43 floors tall and houses 212 stylish residential units.


 


Location


Rak Tower is strategically located in Marina Square on Al Reem Island, offering a bustling, active waterfront community just moments from the city centre. Its central position offers excellent proximity to several important locations:


-
 
Abu Dhabi International Airport - 37.5 km


-
 
Abu Dhabi City Centre - 6 km


-
 
The Galleria Mall - 5 km


-
 
Khalifa Park - 10 km


 


Amenities and Facilities


Rak Tower provides a plethora of world-class facilities and amenities to cater to the needs and wants of its residents:


-
 
24-hour security service ensuring safety


-
 
High-tech elevators


-
 
Swimming pool for adults and kids


-
 
Fully-equipped gymnasium


-
 
Kids' play area


-
 
Basement parking


-
 
Central air conditioning


-
 
Landscaped garden


-
 
Spacious balconies offering breathtaking views


-
 
High-speed internet and satellite/cable TV


-
 
Built-in wardrobes


-
 
Modern kitchens with high-quality fittings


 


Types & Sizes of Available Rooms:


Rak Tower offers a range of different residential units designed to suit various family sizes and budgets:


-
 
1-bedroom apartments: Approximately 80 square meters.


-
 
2-bedroom apartments: Approximately 140 square meters.


-
 
3-bedroom apartments: Approximately 180 square meters.


-
 
Penthouses: Approximately 300 square meters.


 


Why Invest in Rak Tower, Al Reem Island:


Rak Tower stands as a lucrative investment opportunity for several reasons:


-
 
Prime Location: The project enjoys a central location, providing easy access to the city centre, airport, malls, and parks.


-
 
High ROI: The rental yield for apartments in Rak Tower is consistently high, promising a strong return on investment.


-
 
Quality of Life: The plethora of facilities and amenities offered ensures a high standard of living.


-
 
Growing Market: Al Reem Island is one of the fastest-growing residential areas in Abu Dhabi, increasing the value of properties on the island.

About Tamouh Tower in Al Reem Island

Tamouh Tower, nestled in Marina Square on Al Reem Island, Abu Dhabi, stands as a prominent commercial hub. This 32-storey glass-fronted building, completed in 2010, offers a range of office spaces and unrivaled amenities. Developed by Tamouh Ambitions Unlimited, Tamouh Tower has become a symbol of modern business infrastructure.
Property Details and Information
Tamouh Tower, with its 32 storeys, is a dedicated commercial space offering shared workspaces, shell and core offices, and fully fitted offices. Boasting a completion date of 2011, this architectural marvel provides a dynamic environment for businesses to thrive.

Facilities at Tamouh Tower
Parking
Tamouh Tower ensures convenient parking with a multi-level podium and basement, offering occupants allocated spaces ranging from one to ten.
Elevators
Ten high-speed passenger elevators, including a service elevator for transporting bulky items, provide seamless access to all floors. Electricity backup guarantees uninterrupted lift services.
Security and Concierge Services
With 24-hour maintenance, vigilant security staff, CCTV monitoring and access card entry, Tamouh Tower prioritizes safety. The lobby, designed for comfort, includes ramps for differently-abled individuals.

Fitness Amenities
Fitness enthusiasts can explore nearby parks and gyms reachable within a 10-minute drive, contributing to a healthy work-life balance.
Office Spaces in Tamouh Tower
Tamouh Tower offers diverse office spaces, including shared workspaces, shell and core offices, and fully fitted offices. With high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling double-glazed windows, and areas ranging from 283 sq. ft. to 3,229 sq. ft., tenants enjoy panoramic views and aesthetic workspaces.

Location and Distance

Transportation
While transportation options near Tamouh Tower include bus stations and stops, personal vehicles are recommended for convenience. Taxis are available at the nearby Boutik Mall.
Restaurants

An array of restaurants within a 7-minute drive offers diverse culinary experiences, from Lebanese and Arabian at Bshawarma to Italian and Middle Eastern at First Clique Marina Square CafÃ© & Restaurant.

Nearby Buildings
Tamouh Tower is surrounded by notable buildings, including Marina Square, Marina Blue Tower, Bay View Tower, Tala Tower, Burooj Views, Four Seasons Hotel and Resorts, Rosewood Hotels, and Beach Rotana.

Why Invest in Tamouh Tower

Strategic Location: Tamouh Tower's prime location in Marina Square on Al Reem Island positions it as an attractive investment opportunity.
Diverse Office Spaces: The tower provides shared workspaces, shell and core offices, and fully fitted offices, catering to various business needs.
Completion and Architecture: With construction completed in 2011, Tamouh Tower boasts 32 storeys of dynamic commercial space, presenting an architecturally impressive environment for businesses.

result.enMarketingTitle: Elite Residence
result.enPropertyOverView:
Elite Residence Dubai Marina: Luxury Living with a View



Elite Residence is an iconic residential tower situated in the heart of Dubai Marina, one of the most sought-after waterfront communities in the city. This imposing skyscraper stands as a symbol of luxury and sophistication, offering residents an unparalleled living experience.



Key Features:








Prime Waterfront Location:
 Elite Residence is strategically located along the picturesque Dubai Marina, providing residents with stunning views of the marina, the Arabian Gulf, and the surrounding cityscape. This prime location also means easy access to the Marina Walk, a vibrant promenade filled with restaurants, cafes, and shops.




 





Luxurious Amenities:
 Residents of Elite Residence enjoy a wealth of amenities designed to cater to their every need. These may include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a temperature-controlled swimming pool, a dedicated children's play area, and a spacious lounge area for socializing and relaxation.




 





Spacious and Well-Designed Apartments:
 The tower offers a variety of residential units, from cozy studios to expansive penthouses, each thoughtfully designed with high-quality finishes and fixtures. Many units feature balconies to take advantage of the stunning views, while others offer panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows.




 





Convenient Access to the City:
 Living in Dubai Marina means residents have easy access to major highways, making it a breeze to explore all that Dubai has to offer. The nearby Dubai Metro station ensures convenient public transportation options.




 





Round-the-Clock Security:
 Elite Residence takes security seriously, with 24/7 security personnel and advanced access control systems, providing residents with peace of mind.




 





A Symbol of Luxury:
 Elite Residence stands tall as one of the iconic towers in Dubai Marina, adding to the overall allure of this prestigious waterfront neighborhood. It's not just a place to live; it's a symbol of opulence and sophistication.

result.enMarketingTitle: Damac Heights
result.enPropertyOverView:
Welcome to the luxurious Damac Heights, the award-winning high-rise residential tower located in the prestigious Dubai Marina. This iconic landmark features a mix of 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 bedroom apartments, spanning over 86 stories, designed and developed by the renowned Damac Properties.


This masterpiece of architectural finesse is built close to the waterfront and offers breathtaking views of the ocean and the iconic Palm Jumeirah. Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with spacious rooms and glass-fronted balconies that allow ample natural light to flood through, creating an ambiance of luxury and comfort.


Damac Heights offers a variety of apartment types, from studio to 5-bedroom apartments, catering to the diverse needs of discerning buyers. The apartments are adorned with premium fit and finish along with lavish interiors, which makes it a true embodiment of luxury.


As you step into the grand lobby, the 24-hour concierge and reception service enhance and enrich your living experience. The lush landscaped walkways and promenade offer a serene environment to relax and rejuvenate.


Damac Heights offers a plethora of posh amenities and facilities that ensure the best-in-class comfort and convenience. The building boasts of integrated smart safety systems, high-speed elevators, and a temperature-controlled swimming pool. Other facilities include a gymnasium, sauna/steam/spa bath, golf simulator, games room, kids pool and play area, barbecue area, elegant banquet area, meeting room for parties and gatherings, and a separate male/female health club. It also offers day-care facilities and nanny services, making it the perfect residence for families.
